alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 3:24PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds will impact portions of central Tooele County through 415 PM MDT... At 323 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers 11 miles east of Utah Test and Training Range South, or 38 miles northwest of Dugway English Village, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Delle, Knolls, Clive, Skull Valley, Utah Test and Training Range South and Utah Test and Training Range North. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 28 and 71. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
